title: Navigation Menu Entity
description: This document defines navigation menu entity

id.description: A unique identifier for the navigation menu

internal name.description: Internal instance name for the navigation menu

isHierarchical.description: Specifies if the menu is hierarchical

isCollapsed.description: Specifies if the submenu items are in collapsed position

submenuItems.description: An array of submenu items included in the menu

row.description: The row number postion of the menu item

column.description: The column number postion of the menu item

component.description: A URL pointing to the component for the menu item

enabled.description: Specifies if the menu is enabled
